descriptions.name: pl-question-panel
descriptions.description: A container element for displaying the question or problem statement in an assessment.
descriptions.sample:
<pl-question-panel>What is the acceleration of an object falling under gravity?</pl-question-panel>

This tag also acts as a container: you can include other valid HTML tags (such as headers, lists, or line breaks) inside the question panel. If you use these elements, they should have the class name 'pl-question-panel' for consistent styling.

descriptions.name: pl-solution-panel
descriptions.description: A container for displaying the solution or explanation to a question, usually shown after the user submits their answer.
descriptions.sample: <pl-solution-panel>The acceleration due to gravity is approximately 9.8 m/sÂ².</pl-solution-panel>

descriptions.name: pl-checkbox
descriptions.description: A checkbox-based input for multiple selection questions where users can select more than one answer.

attrs.name: answers-name
attrs.description: The name used to group checkboxes for answer submission.

attrs.name: weight
attrs.description: The score or value assigned to this checkbox option.

attrs.name: inline
attrs.description: If present, displays checkboxes inline instead of stacked.

attrs.name: number-answers
attrs.description: Total number of options to display (default: all).

descriptions.sample:
<pl-checkbox answers-name="vpos" weight="1">
  <pl-answer name="ab" description="Option A-B" correct="true">A-B</pl-answer>
  <pl-answer name="bc" description="Option B-C" correct="true">B-C</pl-answer>
  <pl-answer name="cd" description="Option C-D">C-D</pl-answer>
</pl-checkbox>

descriptions.name: pl-number-input
descriptions.description: A numeric input field for capturing numerical answers. Supports different grading methods and precision levels.

attrs.name: answers-name
attrs.description: The name used to identify the answer for submission.

attrs.name: id
attrs.description: A unique identifier for the input element.

attrs.name: digits
attrs.description: Expected number of decimal or significant digits.

attrs.name: label
attrs.description: A label displayed next to the input field.

descriptions.sample: <pl-number-input answers-name="num1" id="input1" comparison="exact" digits="2" label="Enter a number"></pl-number-input>

descriptions.name: pl-hint
descriptions.description: Displays a hint or clue to help the user answer the question. Can be revealed progressively based on level.

attrs.name: level
attrs.description: Indicates the order of the hint to be revealed.

descriptions.sample: <pl-hint data-type="text" level="1">Try breaking the problem into smaller parts.</pl-hint>

descriptions.name: pl-multiple-choice
descriptions.description: A component for single-answer multiple choice questions.

attrs.name: answers-name
attrs.description: The name used to identify the answer for submission.

attrs.name: inline
attrs.description: If present, displays choices inline instead of stacked.

attrs.name: weight
attrs.description: The score or value assigned to this choice.

descriptions.name: pl-input-container
descriptions.description: A layout element used to group multiple input components together. Useful for multi-part questions that logically group inputs into sub-sections with shared context or labels.

attrs.name: section
attrs.description: An optional identifier to label or distinguish each container group.

descriptions.sample:
<pl-question-panel>Part A: Enter force and distance.</pl-question-panel>
 <pl-input-container> <pl-number-input answers-name="force" label="Force (N)" />
  <pl-number-input answers-name="distance" label="Distance (m)" />
</pl-input-container>
